Name: Club Cocktail (Whitfield's recipe)
Ingredients: 2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Pineapple juice adds fruity tropical freshness and a foamy head to this cocktail. Fortified with cognac and aromatised with a splash of maraschino cherry liqueur and a couple of dashes of New Orleans bitters.
History: The Club Cocktail first appeared in W.C. Whitfield's 1939 Just Cocktails book (although does not appear in his 1941 Here's How Mixed Drinks by the same Three Mountaineers Inc. publishers).
Nutrition: One serving of Club Cocktail (Whitfield's recipe) contains 181 calories
